column68: A comprehensive set of templates and guidelines is in development to support teams through the Impact Measurement process.;A comprehensive set of templates is available to support teams through the Impact Measurement process.;
column75: The internal research competency is limited and/or inconsistent. ;
column76: There are defined research requirements in relation to Impact Measurement. ;
column81: The Impact Management Capability is in the process of selecting relevant standards.;
column82: The selected reporting standard(s) are being executed to plan.;Review is incorporated to improve measures.;
column84: Existing and new tools are explored based on critical evaluation.;
column85: Best practices for using the tools are partially implemented across the organisation.;Teams are testing the tools/applications.;
